name: Truck Driving Zombie Road Kill
description:
Get in your armored zombie-smashing machine, then hunt down and eliminate hordes of the undead in massive town and offroad sandbox environments!

There's more than 280 individual zombies to track down and deal with. Want a challenge? Try finding the zombie bosses to unlock special vehicles. Want to relax? No problem; go wild on some of the insane jumps, loops and rooftop trails! We've got you covered!

So whether you're out for vengeance or just that satisfying bone-snapping crunch, jump in and tear it up, you are death on four wheels!

Features:
- Several square miles of terrain to dominate.
- 9 unique battle-hardened vehicles to suit your style.
- Massive, insane jumps & loops.
- Secret hidden areas for the curious to find.
- 280+ zombies to hunt down and splatter!
- Completely free!
- Thousands of pieces of destructable scenery.
- Realistic vehicle physics.
